name: Abhinav Goel
description:
Abhinav is currently based in Singapore and leads Client solutions and Presales for Partior. In this capacity, he oversees clients' journeys including commercial and central banks, from defining use cases to product integration
Before taking on this role, Abhinav gained extensive experience working with both global and local banks. He spearheaded transformative initiatives in Payments and Core Banking, requiring him to coordinate efforts across business units, technology and regulatory bodies
